extendedInfo.description: Get ready for a unique physics-based puzzler.âââ Top Ranked on Google Play, June 2012 - #1 in USA, Germany, France and United Kingdom (casual games category 06/2012)."Those seeking a straightforward, serious cerebral challenge should look no further", score 8.8/10 (Life of Android)"Beautifully simple mechanic that leads to complex and ridiculously fun dynamics. A must buy for android. Runs beautifully even on low end devices." Marc (User review)In Elastic World you control weird elastic shapes in order to make a ball hit the floating star.Expand and collapse these jelly shapes and make the ball bounce in different directions and heights. Sounds weird but is actually pretty fast to pick up.Really nice and responsive physics engine. Feels almost real.Each level gets increasingly challenging and sometimes you have to have some pretty quick reflexes as you compete against the clock. The faster you can hit the star, the better you are ranked. Now with Open Feint support. Share your scores with other players and climb your way to the top of the leader boards.Really fun and addicting!**********Please support independent video game development! This is the result of six months of hard work (done alongside a full-time job). Please give it a good rating.Unlike several other games, the collision detection and physics engine were made entirely from scratch. The game and the level designer contain more than 28,000 lines of source code.Take a peek under the hood and watch the demo of the level designer, available on YouTube. (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nx-fJVXcpBQ)

reviews.title: Needs an update.
reviews.comment: Bought this a while ago and loved it, but breezed through it. Please add more levels. I do not regret buying this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent, great fun!
reviews.comment: even when I repeatedly fail a level (inevitable) I\'m laughing rather than feeling frustrated. very appealing in lots of ways - and I am not usually into the gravity/physics games.
reviews.author: Madolyn Griffith

reviews.title: This game sucks
reviews.comment: Really Dev? You really couldn\'t do any better than this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OVER RATED.
reviews.comment: It\'s originality is to be applauded. HOWEVER the physics do not feel intuitive or natural all of the time. Also finished all levels in 25 minutes with no real reason to return. NEEDS MORE LEVELS MORE VARIETY AND THE ENGINE NEEDS FINE TUNING.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Expertly done physics, six stars if theirs more variation with the music.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & Simply Addicting
reviews.comment: Cool little game... Addictive, infuriating, fun. Parabens! and well done, Pedro.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average, very frustrating.
reviews.comment: I just feel the game mechanics are a bit off and there is no skill, rather just frustrating luck as to whether you conplete a level
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Greet frm india
reviews.comment: I bought this game thinkng as it a new concept in puzzle stuff but this is really different. I cld hve bewn mode betfer if the devoulpers cld hve let the ball pass frm ryt side to lft also n vice versa. Little irritating at times when u get stuck badly n theres no way to get out.  not a long game also. V less rounds n sum r v irritating n badly devoulped. I think of hvng fun while playng these kind of games but this one sumtmes mke me feel lke breakng my phone haha. Stop mkng frustratng rounds
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Overlooked Little Puzzler
reviews.comment: I was going to call this an underrated puzzler but that\'s just not the case. Read through the reviews and you\'ll see most people who give this game a chance love it.   The real problem is the fact that this game should be much more popular. It executes perfectly on a very unique concept and provides a great deal of fun, if not a bit short.  I do hope the Dev hasn\'t abandoned the app. It needs an update if not at the very least to remove the now-defunct Feint. But those extra levels would be appreciated too!
reviews.author: Andrew Watson

reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.
reviews.comment: Beautifully simple mechanic that leads to complex and ridiculously fun dynamics. A must buy for android. Runs beautifully even on low end devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app is a must buy. Runs amazing on any phone I have played it in.  WHERE ARE THE NEW LEVELS THOUGH? I can\'t wait!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: S\'alright
reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars if it weren\'t the most infuriating game I\'ve ever played
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lots of fun,

reviews.comment: After awhile it gets a bit boring. But, great concept.

reviews.title: Great game for killing time at work
reviews.comment: Once u get good at it u start to get hooked on it.  I think people are leaving poor reviews simply because they suck at playing it!

reviews.title: Kinda fun
reviews.comment: Original,  lots of potential.

reviews.title: Not very fun
reviews.comment: This game got really lame very fast.  The game play is not interesting.  The levels are very simple and wooden-- despite the name.  I don\'t feel this game is worth it.

reviews.comment: Very challenging and fun. Great concept and worth the money. You can always get a refund if wanted but you wouldn\'t want to.u
